idea-plugin.name: Refactor4Green
idea-plugin.description: The Refactor4Green plugin aims at helping developers creating Android mobile applications with lower energy consumption rates. In order to achieve this goal, the plugin refactors the source code, according to well-known energy patterns. More details about the energy patterns applied can be found in the Refactor4Green github.
